c74object.name: MaxMuse.eeg_fft
c74object.digest: Receive an LSL stream and send it to Max
c74object.description: Receive an LSL stream and send it to Max.

attribute.name: in_channels
attribute.digest: Number of channels of the LSL stream
attribute.description: Number of channels of the LSL stream.

attribute.name: sample_rate
attribute.digest: Sampling rate of the LSL stream
attribute.description: Sampling rate of the LSL stream.

attribute.name: average
attribute.digest: Average the samples of the LSL stream
attribute.description: Average the samples of the LSL stream.

attribute.name: window
attribute.digest: Window size of the LSL stream
attribute.description: Window size of the LSL stream.
